summary: This mod adds a crafting area to the player homes in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
CRAFTING AREA v1.1b
=================


A plugin for "The Elder Scrolls V, Skyrim"


Description:
=========

This mod adds a crafting area to the player homes in Skyrim.
Including: Breezehome, Honeyside, Vlindrel Hall, Hjerim and Proudspire Manor.
To avoid loading times there are no doors or trapdoors, so you have direct access to the crafting area.
Created as a request.


Features:
=======

* A crafting area for the following player homes in Skyrim:

* Whiterun-Breezehome: an Anvil, an Enchanter, a Grindstone, a Tanning Rack and a Workbench. (added basement)
* Riften-Honeyside: an Anvil, a Grindstone, a Tanning Rack and a Workbench. (added basement)
* Markarth-Vlindrel Hall: an Anvil, a Grindstone, a Tanning Rack and a Workbench. (bookcases removed)
* Windhelm-Hjerim: an Anvil, a Grindstone, a Tanning Rack and a Workbench. (added room)
* Solitude-Proudspire Manor: an Anvil, a Grindstone, a Tanning Rack and a Workbench. (in the basement)


Requirements:
===========

* Skyrim.esm
* Update.esm


Install:
=====

* Unzip the file into your "SkyrimData" directory.
* Or use the nexus mod manager.
* Or subscribe in workshop.

When you run Skyrim, click on Data Files, and make sure that Crafting_area_v1.1b is selected, then play the game.


Uninstall:
=======

* Delete Crafting_area_v1.1b from your "SkyrimData" directory.
* Or uninstall with the nexus mod manager.
* Or unsubscribe in workshop.


Compatibility:
==========

* This mod may not be compatible with other mods that change the area used by this mod.
* Mod is cleaned with TES5Edit.


Changes in v1.1a:
==============

Fixed some minor issues.
Fixed some unnecessary edits.


Changes in v1.1b:
==============

Restored an essential item.


Credits:
======

Bethesda for this great game.

Daventry for Ideas and efforts.
Niveus for beta testing.


Contact:
======

You can find me on TESNEXUS or STEAM as "Veteron".
